items.sentence: I think that the boy over there is Tom's brother.
I think baseball is more popular than basketball.
I try not to drink caffeinated drinks very often.
You can't park your car there without permission.
Tom walked down the gravel road towards his farm.
People are afraid to walk around here after dark.
Do you have any bad habits? If so, what are they?
I half expected to see Tom walk through the door.
I hope that Tom will have the courage to show up.
You don't have to read this if you don't want to.
Do you think Boston is a dangerous place to live?
Tom's behaviour is unpredictable when he's drunk.
Tom said he didn't want to sleep in the basement.
I thought that I told you not to do that anymore.
Don't you think that it would be wise to do that.
Let's play something that everybody can dance to.
My brother and I take turns cleaning our bedroom.
Tom pulled Mary into his arms and held her close.
Unless I'm mistaken, I've seen that woman before.
We all got in Tom's van and headed for the beach.
I'd like to cancel my appointment for June first.
Tom and Mary spend a lot of time with each other.
I've heard women spend more on shoes than men do.
I wish that we could've spent more time together.
We hope that we'll be done by the end of October.
I really do hope that you've learned your lesson.
I hope that Tom wasn't on the plane that crashed.
It's the first time that this has happened to me.
Tomorrow morning Tom and I are leaving Australia.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all from Australia.
Tom wasn't supposed to go to Australia with Mary.
You're the kind of guitarist I like to sing with.
You have no idea how important this job is to me.
You look so good that I could kiss you right now.
Many people eat fried chicken with their fingers.
How did you know that Tom didn't have to do that?
How did you know that Tom didn't need to do that?
Tom got transferred to a maximum security prison.
Tom got asked to the Sadie Hawkins dance by Mary.
Tom doubted Mary was as rich as she said she was.
Tom wasn't satisfied with the work Mary had done.
Tom wasn't the first one to turn in his homework.
Tom wasn't able to escape from the burning plane.
Tom should be able to do everything he should do.
It'll likely be more fun than you think it'll be.
Tom and Mary visited me the day before yesterday.
Please count how many people are in the audience.
What's the name of the bus stop near Tom's house?
Tom wasn't the one who suggested we buy balloons.
Tom and Mary are in the living room, watching TV.
